      • AddListener

      • RemoveListener

        public void RemoveListener(SensorListener<Pose> l)

      • addTargetReference

        public boolean addTargetReference(java.lang.String targetName,
                                  double xTrans,
                                  double yTrans,
                                  double zTrans,
                                  double angle,
                                  double longSideTransFromCenterToVertex,
                                  double shortSideTransFromCenterToVertex)
        Add a target to the 'world map'. Only targets added to this map will be used by SensorImageLocalizer to compute camera pose.
        Parameters:
        targetName - unique identifier for target, must match target name in TargetInfo from whatever image target tracker sensor provides input to SensorImageLocalizer
        xTrans - describes target position and rotation in world coordinates
        yTrans - describes target position and rotation in world coordinates
        zTrans - describes target position and rotation in world coordinates
        Returns:
        true if the targetName was not previously mapped and the mapping was added successfully, false otherwise

        public void onUpdate(java.util.List<TrackedTargetInfo> targetPoses)
